import { useFetchCourseQuery, useFetchCourseLevelQuery, useFetchCategoriesQuery } from "services/courses"; import { selectLocationPayload } from "state/location/selectors"; import { useAppSelector } from "store/hooks"; import { useState, useEffect } from "react"; import Autosuggest from 'react-autosuggest'; import type { CourseResponse } from 'services/courses' import { courseMessage } from "portal/state/location/actions"; import { RTEditor } from 'portal/scenes/Instructor/Editor'; import classNames from "classnames"; import type { CategoryResponse } from "services/courses"; import styles from './style.module.scss' export const LandingPage = () => { const locationPayload = useAppSelector(selectLocationPayload); const { data: course, isLoading } = useFetchCourseQuery(locationPayload.id) const { data: levels } = useFetchCourseLevelQuery() const { data: categories } = useFetchCategoriesQuery() const [category, setCategory] = useState() const [suggestions, setSuggestions] = useState([]); const [suggestionValue, setSuggestionValue] = useState(); const [courseUpdate, setCourseUpdate] = useState(course) const renderSuggestion = suggestion => { if (suggestion.isAddNew) { return ( [+] Add new: {suggestionValue} ); } return suggestion.name; }; const onSuggestionsFetchRequested = ({ value }) => { } const handleSuggestionChange = (event, { newValue, method}) => { setSuggestionValue(newValue) } const suggestInputProps = { placeholder: 'Type suggestion', value: suggestionValue, onChange: handleSuggestionChange } useEffect(() => { setCourseUpdate(course) }, [course]) if (isLoading || !courseUpdate) { return (
